mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wsbank_product_flow( id, Member_Id, Phone_Number, Create_Time, Account, Product_Flow_Num, Product_Id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{memberId}, #{phoneNumber}, #{createTime}, #{account}, #{productFlowNum}, #{productId}, #{createBy.id} , #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )

INSERT INTO wsbank_product_flow( id, Member_Id, Phone_Number, Create_Time, Account, Product_Flow_Num, Product_Id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date ) VALUES
( #{productFlow.id}, #{productFlow.memberId}, #{productFlow.phoneNumber}, #{productFlow.createTime}, #{productFlow.account}, #{productFlow.productFlowNum}, #{productFlow.productId}, #{productFlow.createBy.id} , #{productFlow.createDate}, #{productFlow.updateBy.id}, #{productFlow.updateDate} )
